title: INVITE FRIENDS
ctaText: Get Followers and extend your network.

tagsInput.placeholder: Add emails manually. Separate by a comma or hit enter after each email.

emailTemplateText: Can I see the email before sending?
pickEmailService: Choose an app to send invitations:
sendManually: or copy the link below and post it on your Facebook, Instagram, or any other social channel. This link directs to your ARTMO profile.
emailContent:
Hi, quickly sending you this… 

Have a look at my ARTMO profile.

Would be fantastic if you can join me there, a great art community with plenty exciting content.
We can connect and follow.

Would be great :)
I am looking forward to it.
Keep in touch.

template.emailContent: Hello, I would like you to join my network on ARTMO.
